Solhint

This is an open source project for linting solidity code.

View on GitHub

payable-fallback

The {‚Äúextends‚Äù: ‚Äúsolhint:recommended‚Äù} property in a configuration file enables this rule.

Description

When fallback is not payable you will not be able to receive ethers.

Options

This rule accepts a string option of rule severity. Must be one of ‚Äúerror‚Äù, ‚Äúwarn‚Äù, ‚Äúoff‚Äù. Default to warn.

Example Config

{
  "rules": {
    "payable-fallback": "warn"
  }
}

Examples

üëç Examples of correct code for this rule

Fallback is payable


      pragma solidity 0.4.4;
        
        
      contract A {
        function () public payable {}
      }

üëé Examples of incorrect code for this rule

Fallback is not payable


      pragma solidity 0.4.4;
        
        
      contract A {
        function () public {}
      }

Version

This rule is introduced in the latest version.
